alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 1:35PM CST until February 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow, Slick Travel Persist... .Bands of snow will continue through mid afternoon before gradually diminishing from the west by later this afternoon. So far, an inch or two of snow has been reported. Roads across portions of southwest Wisconsin and northeast Iowa are snow- covered or slippery, so if you must travel this afternoon, check conditions before heading out and drive with caution. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...In Iowa, Clayton County. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
